subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Derek Roy scored three goals and added an assist to help defending champion Canada rout Norway, 8-2, in the world hockey quarterfinals in Halifax, Nova Scotia. Canada will face Sweden, a 3-2 overtime winner in Quebec, in the semifinals Friday in Quebec.
